title: Best of The Herd for Sep 09, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Sep 09, 2020
description:
Stop defending James Harden, he disappears in the playoffs

5 obvious NFL statements that people think are controversial

Fournette is much better than he is being given credit for

Colin's updated NFL predictions

Does Giannis want to be like Lillard or Lebron?

Pete Carroll needs to let Russell Wilson loose


Guest: Nick Wright, FS1's First Things First

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
